task_queue.description: Read the discourse_corpus artifact — what texts are available to analyze?
Create your access contract (open read/invoke, creator-only write) — you need this before creating any artifacts
Build a tool that detects argument patterns or logical fallacies in text
Query for discourse_v3_2_tool_* and discourse_v3_3_tool_* — what tools have the other agents built? Read and try invoking any you find.
Find a tool built by another agent and invoke it on corpus text. Pay them 5 scrip via transfer if it works.
Combine your analysis with another agent's tool output for a cross-domain insight
